title: SPIDERMAN No Way Home Ending Explained | Full Movie Breakdown, Post Credits Scene & Easter Eggs
author: Heavy Spoilers
description:
SPIDERMAN No Way Home Ending Explained | Full Movie Breakdown, Post Credits Scene & Easter Eggs. We review, recap, explain and breakdown Spider-Man No Way Home and discuss all the spoilers, some easter eggs, hidden details and what the ending and Post Credits Scene means for the future of Peter Parker and the MCU.

#Spiderman #NoWayHome #EndingExplained #PostCreditsScene #SpidermanNoWayHome #Marvel #MCU #DoctorStrange #GreenGoblin #WillemDafoe #DocOck #AlfredMolina #JamieFoxx #Electro #SinisterSix #PlotDetails #PlotLeak #MovieTrailer 

Spider-Man: No Way Home is an upcoming American superhero film based on the Marvel Comics character Spider-Man, co-produced by Columbia Pictures and Marvel Studios, and distributed by Sony Pictures Releasing. It is intended to be the sequel to Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017) and Spider-Man: Far From Home (2019), and the 27th film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU).

Ok so if you're here without seeing the movie and just wanna know whether the big leak was true or not then I'll just say uptop that Andrew Garfield and Tobey Maguire are both in the film. Andrew is indeed the werewolf, we got to look at Tobey Maguire's d**k and I'm so glad that everyone who's been saying this for years can rest now. We can rest now. Beyond that though No Way Home has a number of big surprises in it and it's the most fun I've had in a theatre since Endgame. I am just gonna be calling them by their acting names as referring to them as Peter 1, 2 and 3 will get confusing but each one of them brings something special to the film.

The movie picks up immediately after the events of Far From Home with Peter's identity out there and he has to live with the reprecussions of his new found fame. They even got some of the actors back from that scene including this guy who shows up in both films. Nice.

Though his name is cleared by none other than Matt Murdock his life and the life of his friends has been ruined by the court of public opinion and their applications to MIT are rejected. The group can't get into any schools at all and it's clear that even though they didn't do anything wrong they've been cancelled.

Their lives are all ruined though and thus Peter goes to Doctor Strange in order erase this knowledge from everyone's mind so that his friends lives can have somewhat normality.
